trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This is an **Azure Mobile Apps** topic.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This is an **Azure Mobile Apps** topic.

trans-unit.source: For Mobile Services topics, see the [Mobile Services documentation center](/documentation/services/mobile-services/).
trans-unit.target: For Mobile Services topics, see the [Mobile Services documentation center](/documentation/services/mobile-services/).

trans-unit.source: App Service Mobile Apps is our newest mobile backend platform and [gives you additional advantages](app-service-mobile-value-prop-migration-from-mobile-services.md) over Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: App Service Mobile Apps is our newest mobile backend platform and [gives you additional advantages](app-service-mobile-value-prop-migration-from-mobile-services.md) over Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: [Migrating to App Service](app-service-mobile-migrating-from-mobile-services.md) is recommended for customers using the .NET backend SDK.
trans-unit.target: [Migrating to App Service](app-service-mobile-migrating-from-mobile-services.md) is recommended for customers using the .NET backend SDK.

trans-unit.source: However, [Mobile Apps Node SDK](https://github.com/azure/azure-mobile-apps-node) is currently in Preview and is not yet recommended for production use.
trans-unit.target: However, [Mobile Apps Node SDK](https://github.com/azure/azure-mobile-apps-node) is currently in Preview and is not yet recommended for production use.

trans-unit.source: SDK and API contracts are subject to change within minor version releases.
trans-unit.target: SDK and API contracts are subject to change within minor version releases.
